about.details:
Incorporated in 2005, Gujarat based Palm Jewels Limited is a company engaged in the wholesale business of gold jewelry. The company sells gold based chains, bracelets, and necklaces. It outsources the manufacturing of the jewelry through job workers based in Ahmedabad and Mumbai. The major raw material used for making the products is gold & silver. Gold bars and other necessary material are provided to the job workers who are based either in Ahmedabad and Mumbai.

The finished jewelry is sold by the company's marketing and sales team directly to other jewelry stores. The jewelry is widely sold throughout Gujarat only through B2B marketing and/ or Direct/Outbound marketing strategy. Some of the major customers include M/s. Zaverat, Mehta Ornaments Private Limited, Shah Chinubhai Ramniklal Co., and Shubhlaxmi Jewellers, etc.

Palm Jewels currently has 11 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Palm Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer:
Palm Jewels IPO is a SME IPO of 2968000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.90 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on May 25, 2018, and closes on June 4, 2018.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Palm Jewels IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Palm Jewels IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Palm Jewels IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Palm Jewels IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Palm Jewels IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Palm Jewels IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Palm Jewels IPO opens on May 25, 2018 and closes on June 4, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Palm Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer: Palm Jewels IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Palm Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Palm Jewels IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Palm Jewels IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Palm Jewels IPO will be done on Wednesday, June 6, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, June 7, 2018. Check the Palm Jewels IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Palm Jewels IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Palm Jewels IPO listing date is on Tuesday, June 12, 2018.
